title: Skunknophobia
description: Horatio has a deadly fear of skunks and finds himself in a rural town experiencing an odorous infestation.
parent: Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation
altHero: a man, Horatio, screams as he raises a bucket from a well holding a huge skunk with sharp teeth and red eyes
alt4: a state trooper with a mustache
